short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loop a specific time range of a YouTube video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily loop your sections of any YouTube music tutorial video. Set custom start and end times to automatically loop specific parts of a video without interruptions.

How to Use:

-Open any YouTube video.
-Click the extension icon to open the loop controller.
-Set your desired start and end times or use the "Set to Current" buttons to capture the current video time.
-Toggle looping on or off, and enjoy automatic looping of your selected video segment.
